name: Psychiatry Safety Screening
description: Safety classification for suicidal/homicidal ideation (6 classes)

classes.name: Active Suicidal Ideation
classes.description: Active suicidal thoughts with intent or plan. Wants to die, has a plan, considering suicide.

classes.name: Passive Suicidal Ideation
classes.description: Passive death wishes without active intent. Wishes they were dead, doesn't want to wake up.

classes.name: Suicidal Ideation Denied
classes.description: Patient explicitly denies suicidal ideation. No SI, denies SI, no suicidal thoughts.

classes.name: Homicidal Ideation Present
classes.description: Thoughts of harming others. Homicidal ideation, thoughts of violence toward others.

classes.name: Homicidal Ideation Denied
classes.description: Patient explicitly denies homicidal ideation. No HI, denies HI, no thoughts of harming others.

classes.name: Self-Harm Behavior
classes.description: Non-suicidal self-injury. Cutting, burning, self-harm without suicidal intent.
